name: madone
description: \ wow! just got my new trek road bike. \ it's the first year Trek went with "compact geometry" (downslope tube) bike styling \ after winning the Tour de France with a slightly better version of this bike. \ \ Upgrading from an aluminum bike with carbon fork (hardtail) to this 100% carbon \ frame and fork is just incredible! it absorbs bumps and road noise like a 70s \ bouncy caddy so you and your bum can keep riding for hours. \ \ it climbs and descends amazing. trek has an incredible bike here. \ and now i do, too, yay! \ \ I'm looking forward to the 1000s of miles of training for my first \ Aids Lifecycle \ (7 day bikeride from SF to LA!) \
